features: INCREDIBLE SHINE: It’s time to say goodbye to your old Moroccan oil hair products that leave your wanting more, and upgrade to Pure Nature Lux Spa’s deep conditioner for dry damaged hair; Our argan Moroccan oil conditioner gives your hair incredible shine that’s soft and manageable; For dazzling locks that turn heads, Pure Nature Lux Spa’s hydrating conditioner is the answer

SULFATE FREE: Make hair conditioner for damaged dry hair with questionable ingredients a thing of the past with Pure Nature Lux Spa; This moisturizing conditioner is totally free of sulfates and parabens; Better still, our sulfate free conditioner is never tested on animals

SALON GRADE: We’ve worked in close consultation with respected hair care experts to bring you a salon grade argan oil conditioner; This conditioner for dry hair nourishes from root to tip and contains a blend of hydrating ingredients including collagen, argan oil for hair and collagen

DEEPLY HYDRATING: Make dry, brittle hair and broken, split ends a thing of the past with this womens and mens conditioner from Pure Nature Lux Spa’s; Argan oil for hair has been used for centuries in Morocco as a way to treat damage and create amazing shine; We’ve harnessed the same plant power to bring you a detangling conditioner that deeply hydrating

PROTECTIVE COATING: If you’re in search of conditioner for damaged hair that helps protect and reverse the signs of exposure, Pure Nature Lux Spa’s conditioner for men and women is the answer; The secret is how the argan oil in our hair conditioner for women and men binds to each strand, creating a protective coating that smooths hair, boosts shine and stops damage

Which Pure Nature Lux Spa combination is ideal for you? Argan Oil Add to Cart Tea Tree Add to Cart Biotin Add to Cart Keratin Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 21,726 4.3 out of 5 stars 299 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,569 4.5 out of 5 stars 759 Price $24.99$24.99 $19.99$19.99 $19.99$19.99 $19.99$19.99 BEST FOR Boost shine, restore damage Fight flaky, itchy scalps Boost hair volume Stop hair breakage HAIR ISSUE Damaged, broken & dull hair Irritated scalp, flaky itch Very fine or thinning hair Dry, brittle and broken hair BENEFITS Silky smoothness & less frizz Soothes and stops flakes Fuller, thicker feeling hair Stops split ends and breakage KEY INGREDIENTS Argan oil, aloe, keratin Tea tree oil, argan oil, B5 Biotin, B5, silk extract Keratin, silk protein, argan FOR HAIR TYPE Dry Itchy Thinning Damaged

Salon Grade Conditioner We’ve consulted with hair care experts to bring you a salon grade deep conditioner for dry damaged hair that’s respected by stylists across the globe. Repairs Damaged Hair Moroccan oil for hair works to reverse the signs of damage and protect against further exposure by creating a protective coating around each strand. Incredible Deep Hydration People with brittle hair love how our moisturizing conditioner penetrates deep beyond the outer layers for a deeply hydrating treatment to boost shine For All Hair Types More than just a hydrating conditioner, our argan oil formula is safe to use on color treated hair, as well as curly, wavy, frizzy and straight locks.

How do I use this conditioner? After washing your hair with our argan oil shampoo and rinsing thoroughly, squirt about 5 to 10 pumps into your palm and massage through your hair from root to tip. Leave in for 3 to 5 minutes and rinse well. Is this a leave in treatment? No. Our Moroccan argan oil shampoo and conditioner is designed to be used like a regular conditioner. Massage thoroughly through wet hair, leave the conditioner in for between 3 to 5 minutes and rine. Repeat once if necessary. Will the oils in this conditioner clog your drain? No. Our hydrating conditioner is specially formulated to be friendly to your drainage system. People who have used Pure Nature Lux Spa’s argan oil conditioner for years report no issues with their drains clogging. Is this conditioner only for women? No. Our Moroccan argan oil conditioner has been formulated for everyone. Men, women, children and everyone else loves how our conditioner leaves their hair shining. If you are a person with hair on your head, this salon grade conditioner is for you. Will this strip my hair of color? No. Pure Nature Lux Spa’s argan oil conditioner is safe to use on color treated and bleached hair. Crafted to help preserve your color, this argan conditioner is suitable to use on all types of hair, including frizzy, straight, wavy and even curly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have started swimming most days. I decided I needed a shampoo that takes out the chlorine (got that) and some conditioner. I decided to try this one. Absolutely a wonderful product. So happy with how my hair combs out, how it smells and feels when dry. So much softer and less dry! Will use this each wash ( which is most days). Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Transformed my hair in the best way possible!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Moroccan Argan Oil Conditioner for several months now and I am already seeing a significant difference in the health and appearance of my hair. As someone with dry, damaged, and frizzy hair, I have tried countless products over the years, but this conditioner has truly exceeded my expectations. The fact that it's sulfate-free is a huge plus since I'm trying to avoid harsh chemicals. The conditioner is made with natural ingredients like argan oil which provides my hair with the moisture and nourishment it needs to look and feel its best. The texture of the conditioner is creamy and luxurious, and it leaves my hair feeling soft and silky from the first use. After several uses, my hair is much more manageable, and I'm noticing a reduction in frizz and breakage. I also appreciate that the conditioner doesn't weigh my hair down or leave any residue, which is important to me since I have fine hair. Overall, I would highly recommend Moroccan Argan Oil Conditioner to anyone looking for a high-quality product that can transform even the most damaged, dry, curly or frizzy hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner leaves hair so soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ONLY ABLE TO USE ONCE
reviews.reviewText: I was only able to use this conditioner one time. There is something in the ingredients that I am allergic to. After using it, I had a reaction so I mailed it back to Amazon. I can say that it smelled good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life changing. But it! You'll thank me!
reviews.reviewText: I have dry brittle fine hair that is thinning due to age. This product brought my hair back again, lush, thick, soft, shiny, moisturized! Every girl needs this in her life! I have even mixed some in a spray bottle with water as an all night hair mask! Wonderful stuff!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Literally the best Shampoo/Conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: I love that I only needed a very tiny amount of shampoo for a huge lather! Conditioner leaves hair very silky. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have 3C curly hair and have been using this product for probably a little over a month. The formula is very lightweight, there’s not much smell(I prefer a nice smelling conditioner that lingers. This does not.) I commonly finger detangle my curls and this works through the hair well to do that. The product is okay! But I feel like I’ve had better argon conditioner personally. Not bad but not great overall in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best conditioner for knots
reviews.reviewText: I have tried dozens of conditioners for knots and tangles in my very curly, frizzy, dry hair. My comb ran through my hair like butter after using this conditioner! I was shocked! It smells like a nice salon and it is not thick and sticky like other products I’ve used. This is the best conditioner I have ever used!!! Highly recommend!
To be honest, I don’t feel like this helped a lot with my keratin treated hair but it smells so nice!
